price: Cuando las aguas lo inundaron todo, salvé en el arca a Noé y a quienes creyeron en él,
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
